mapper.insert:
insert into comment
id,
moment_id,
gmt_created,
gmt_modified,
is_deleted,
content,

mapper.update:
update comment
moment_id = #{momentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update comment set moment_id = #{momentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
